creator: Jagmeet Singh
title: (No AI) India has 100M weekly active ChatGPT users, Sam Altman says
dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says India has the largest number of student users of ChatGPT worldwide.
contentSnippet: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says India has the largest number of student users of ChatGPT worldwide.

creator: Rebecca Bellan
title: (No AI) The enterprise AI land grab is on. Glean is building the layer beneath the interface.
dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
content: In this week's episode of the Equity podcast, Glean CEO Arvind Jain explains the company's shift from enterprise search tool to middleware layer for enterprise AI.
contentSnippet: In this week's episode of the Equity podcast, Glean CEO Arvind Jain explains the company's shift from enterprise search tool to middleware layer for enterprise AI.

title: (No AI) I hate my AI pet with every fiber of my being
author: Robert Hart
content:
![A bronze Moflin on a wooden desk. ](https://platform.theverge.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2026/02/268331_Casio_Moflin_AI_pet_hands_on_RHart_0002.jpg?quality=90&strip=all&crop=0,0,100,100)

I can still hear it whining and whirring. | Photo by Robert Hart / The Verge

After a few weeks living with [Casio's AI-powered pet, Moflin](https://www.theverge.com/2024/10/11/24268063/casio-robot-pet-moflin), I finally understand why my mother hated my Furby so much. The fuzzy, guinea-pig-adjacent puffball fits snugly in the palm of my hand. It's undeniably cute, in a weird kind of way, but the second it starts to squeak or twitch, I am hit with an overwhelming desire to hurl it as far as I can.

My antipathy surprises me. By any metric, I am the exact kind of person Moflin was made for: I long for the companionship of a pet, but can't own one thanks to a mixture of lifestyle, allergies, a small London flat, and a broadly irresponsible temperament that makes caring for another living …

[Read the full story at The Verge.](https://www.theverge.com/gadgets/877858/life-with-casio-moflin-robot-ai-pet)

It's undeniably cute, in a weird kind of way, but the second it starts to squeak or twitch, I am hit with an overwhelming desire to hurl it as far as I can. 
My antipathy surprises me. By any metric, I am the exact kind of person Moflin was made for: I long for the companionship of a pet, but can't own one thanks to a mixture of lifestyle, allergies, a small London flat, and a broadly irresponsible temperament that makes caring for another living  …
Read the full story at The Verge.

title: (No AI) AI can’t make good video game worlds yet, and it might never be able to
author: Jay Peters
content:
![Project Genie rendering of a Mario-like world](https://platform.theverge.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2026/02/the-stepback-mario-back.png?quality=90&strip=all&crop=0,0,100,100)

_This is_ [The Stepback](https://www.theverge.com/the-stepback-newsletter)_, a weekly newsletter breaking down one essential story from the tech world. For more news about video game industry's pushback against generative AI, [follow Jay Peters](https://www.theverge.com/authors/jay-peters)._ The Stepback _arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 8AM ET. Opt in for_ The Stepback [_here_](https://www.theverge.com/newsletters)_._

## How it started

Long before the generative AI explosion, video game developers made games that could generate their own worlds. Think of titles like _Minecraft_ or even the original 1980 _Rogue_ that is the basis for the term "roguelike"; these games and many others create worlds on the fly with certain rules and parameters. Human developers painstakingly work to make s …

[Read the full story at The Verge.](https://www.theverge.com/column/879524/ai-video-game-worlds-project-genie)

title: (No AI) GPT-5.2 derives a new result in theoretical physics
content: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.
contentSnippet: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.

title: (No AI) Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT

creator: David Nield
title: (No AI) Google’s AI Overviews Can Scam You. Here’s How to Stay Safe
dc:creator: David Nield
content: Beyond mistakes or nonsense, deliberately bad information being injected into AI search summaries is leading people down potentially harmful paths.
contentSnippet: Beyond mistakes or nonsense, deliberately bad information being injected into AI search summaries is leading people down potentially harmful paths.

creator: Zeyi Yang
title: (No AI) OpenAI Is Nuking Its 4o Model. China’s ChatGPT Fans Aren’t OK
dc:creator: Zeyi Yang
content: As OpenAI removed access to GPT-4o in its app on Friday, people who have come to rely on the chatbot for companionship are mourning the loss all over the world.
contentSnippet: As OpenAI removed access to GPT-4o in its app on Friday, people who have come to rely on the chatbot for companionship are mourning the loss all over the world.
